entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}{F813,1,417003}I got scared and ran when he was fighting{F801}with Kenji.{F801}{F802}Ever since, I've felt guilty, and come{F801}here to visit now and then.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}{F813,1,417003}I got scared and ran when he was fighting{F801}with Kenji.{F801}{F802}Ever since, I've felt guilty, and come{F801}here to visit now and then.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}I'm really glad to know he's still alive.{F801}Not that I have the right to show my{F801}face to the guy...{F801}{F802}Thanks, though. You can have this.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}I'm really glad to know he's still alive.{F801}Not that I have the right to show my{F801}face to the guy...{F801}{F802}Thanks, though. You can have this.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demonoid guard\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415200}Yo Akira. I heard from the guys below{F801}that you captured the Intruders?{F801}{F802}Well, you can leave the patrols here{F801}to me... Though there's only so much{F801}I can do.{F801}{F802}Hurry up and become the King so we can{F801}all live on easy street.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demonoid guard\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415200}Yo Akira. I heard from the guys below{F801}that you captured the Intruders?{F801}{F802}Well, you can leave the patrols here{F801}to me... Though there's only so much{F801}I can do.{F801}{F802}Hurry up and become the King so we can{F801}all live on easy street.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male Demonoid\0{F87A,167}{F813,1,415207}You going inside the Terminal Room?{F801}Don't bother, buddy.{F801}{F802}There's no teleporter, so there's no{F801}point to the Terminal.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Male Demonoid\0{F87A,167}{F813,1,415207}You going inside the Terminal Room?{F801}Don't bother, buddy.{F801}{F802}There's no teleporter, so there's no{F801}point to the Terminal.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}It's faint, but I can feel some of that{F801}man's Magnetite from you, mister.{F801}{F802}He's got a real stitched-up face, but{F801}he's living in this "Shinjuku" place.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}It's faint, but I can feel some of that{F801}man's Magnetite from you, mister.{F801}{F802}He's got a real stitched-up face, but{F801}he's living in this "Shinjuku" place.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Undine is no longer here...{F801}
